website_summaries.verdict: A lighter-weight option, this is a boot/sneaker hybrid.
pros: Waffle textile with a traditional eyelet lace-up style
Looks like a sneaker but retains the brand’s iconic style
Comes with removable memory foam insert
cons: Despite a more summery look, feet can get hot in these

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! I love the matte-looking leather finish and that you can get the Doc Marten boot look in a lighter, more subtle shoe. I forget how comfortable they are until I put on a different pair of boots and realize what I'm missing. They've held up great through a lot of snow, salt, and rain. There was hardly any break-in time and I wear these constantly --- you can wear them all day without any problems! Sometimes the tongue of the shoe will slip to the side, but I haven't found it to be an issue. I normally wear a U.S. size 7 1/2 and these UK size 6 fit great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Y.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t feel authentic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in December and something just feels off about them. The “suede” feels off like it’s faux suede! These aren’t authentic my friend has these and the suede feels different! I wore them during the rain because these were the only boots I had so don’t think I can return them I’m stuck with them but I’m very disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Perez019

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for Cold Weather
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good replacement for my cheap combat boots, and these are it. These fit my style perfectly, they kept my feet warm on a cold 20F day, and they're nice and comfy. Would 110% buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed something sturdy and waterproof. Well these definitely were sturdy. I'm guessing that they would hold up well in bad weather too. I would suggest sizing down because ecen after ordering my size they were a bit big. Somehow though the outer sides of the shoe rubbed oddly against my feet and hurt :( I don't have wide feet and since these were a bit roomy I have no idea why that was happening.. also the area of the shoe that rested against my legs above my ankle rubbed in a chaffing way (even after putting on long socks) For someone else these shoes will probably be a dream, but not for me 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: PracticalMage

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and very easy to break in. They fit true to size as well. If youre going to wear these as winter boots, I recommend wearing thick socks as Docs are not well insulated for winter unless you have winter boots.
customer_reviews.author: Regan saylor

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't make it happen
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were too narrow. I normally wear a 9 but I ordered a 8 1/2 based on reviews saying they were big. The 8 1/2 was too narrow so I tried the 9. They were better but too slouchy and the tounge wouldn't stay put. And they still seemed to pinch my baby toes. So I had to send them back. FYI, They have next to no support in them.
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Bess

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! My daughter talked me into getting a pair after raving about how comfortable they are. I am on my feet teaching for three hours at a time, and I wore these straight out of the box with no problems. I liked them so much I also bought an oxblood red pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Arborite

customer_reviews.title: They are not as comfortable as regular Docs but are much lighter
customer_reviews.text: They are not as comfortable as regular Docs but are much lighter. I really like them and think they are worth the price. The leather is the same as regular docs so it has taken a few wears to break them in. All in all I am really happy with them and would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenea

customer_reviews.title: Ok but barely made it past 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Shoes tung will not stay in place. This is the most annoying thing ever. The ankles scuffed pretty fast on them. They likely won’t last a year from wearing them pretty frequently, it’s a bummer because they aren’t that cheap. They were broken in well when I got them but after 6 months I wore the bottoms out.
customer_reviews.author: staaySSSIIICCCK

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter and she loves them. She said they feel a little big, like maybe a half size but not enough that she can't wear them comfortably. Lighter weight style with flat bottom soles was exactly what she was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Recovering Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot but not for my needs, I have an ankle sprain and there is no support in the sole or upper of these boots. They are stiff and would take time to break-in. They are cute for a fashion boot but not for hiking or support. Sadly I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but cut legs without long socks.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the boots they look nice, nice color, etc and are my style. The only thing that I don't like is that if I don't wear long socks with them the edges cut my skin/legs. So one needs to wear long socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Like all Doctor Martens: too expensive not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I liked the picture. On the foot... not so great. Definitely need to put some thought about what to wear with these. Also they are fabric, somewhat cushion-y , maybe some type of foam? They get very hot, but is not a boot for winter -at least New England winters- or for rain.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Used shoes were mailed instead
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well but we received used and dirty shoes! It was so disappointing and I already started the return process. These have clearly been used and are covered with some sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting less bulky martens and these do not disappoint!. Very happy with my purchase. matte and small combat boots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these boots! They fit perfectly. I’d wear them everyday if i could
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were just as expected and described. Fit is great and they just need to be broken in a bit. These are dope af. Seller was quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: JenniO

customer_reviews.title: First pair in 15 years
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to see that docs come in a lighter version for those of us that just aren't the grunge enthusiasts we were in the 90s. These are lightweight, comfortable, and still warm enough for a cool or rainy day. I really like the pattern, which is slightly different on each shoe so they don't mirror each other.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size. No return policy
customer_reviews.text: The description says it's a male size 5 but it is a 5 in women's and now says my item is ineligible for exchange or return so now I'm stuck with shoes I cant wear....
customer_reviews.author: Chantal huskey

customer_reviews.text: These boots are BEAUTIFUL but they are way too tight?! I tried on the same size at the store and they fit perfect! I have to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Like the deconstructed style
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had these boots long but it's my second pair of this deconstructed style, and I like them. Comfortable and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mercurial Gray

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: these took forever to get to me but i love the quality of them, they are legit martens. I saw reviews from others and they kept saying negative things about them but i would recommend to anyone one else. Ive worn them in the rain and in the cold keep my feet comfortable and dry and they are durable have had ones for a while now and they still look like new (Also because i take care of them unlike other people that complained on the reviews, like a video someone left). so do buy them!
customer_reviews.author: diana saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these. Warm and water proof. Would suggest insoles if walking a lot.
customer_reviews.author: SargeantNarwhal

customer_reviews.title: so it worked out great. Ordered size 10 women's
customer_reviews.text: Run long but not wide. I needed to room for my orthotics, so it worked out great. Ordered size 10 women's.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for UK sizes!
customer_reviews.text: The textile was different than I expected and the size was recommended by the dealer, but was incorrect, I am a US 8,not a UK 8.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Martinez

customer_reviews.title: very happy feet :-)))
customer_reviews.text: never thought i'd find grey hi-tops, but i did!!! doc marten makes this shoe a pleasure to wear. the colour is a rich grey and can look good with anything...denim to velvet. amazing comfort and really well made. super delivery time (a blink) and a great price. this is a shoe that's going to be on your feet year round..top drawer investment...........
customer_reviews.author: rn4u

customer_reviews.title: Vintage print on a perfect boot
customer_reviews.text: Vintage print on a perfect boot. The material is lighter in weight, so these boots have the feel of sneakers. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K Ward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are GORGEOUS. The print and material is beautiful, and I got so many compliments the first day I wore them. I usually wear the "chunkier" 1460 boots, but these are a nice change. They fit just a little looser than expected, but not so much that they are uncomfortable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie Egbuna

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow, but the length it's ok. Works good on wet floors. They do not slip.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit like a glove! I wear a UK 7/ 40 Euro/ US10 and the size and width are perfect. Quality is good so far. Lightweight shoe compared to the original docs. My only complaint is that the tongue wont stay in place. Two "toes" up!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Great light boot
customer_reviews.text: It looks awesome and feels great. Not for everyone, but I wear them quite often have 2 pairs in brown and 2 in black
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I tend to have difficulty with euro sizing. I wear 7.5 US. I got an 8. These weren't too big...I was so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a pair, but waited and I’m glad I did! I love that there is not a heel but still squishy! Super cute with shorts and skirts!
customer_reviews.author: Liesel

customer_reviews.title: Good seller, good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She wears them all the time. They're Docs, so the quality is great. The price was pretty good and they got there in great time.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and easy to break in
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and easy to break in, have had the same pair through three winters in New England and they are still doing alright! Not great for heavy snow, but they are definitely more durable than I expected! Have lasted through many concerts and festivals in the mud
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots that I have ever bought. I already had a couple of DMs and even a canvas salmon shoreditch pair, but i love the leather because it holds its form better and i can wear them in the rain or snow. I feel like I'm making my other shoes jealous because I wear these so much now
customer_reviews.author: Alle Logan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy them all over again.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, and my daughter really loves them. They have held up well even when she wears them to PE and on the field. She's even hiked in them. They are much more comfortable than Converse high tops, even though the style is similar. Plus, they're Dr. Martens. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes but too big!
customer_reviews.text: My fault Didn't read the size chart correctly. Great looking& felt so nice but way way too big to keep. My bad not the Docs or Amazons!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Heathcliff

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Comfortably loose, not too snug fits exactly as expected. Great look not sure if they're leather but they look like it, got lots of compliments on them. A little expensive but worth it for that signature Dr. Martens quality. So comfortable after broken in for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: S. E.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Nice with jeans or dress up. I'm getting lots of compliments on these fun shoes. They also are nicely lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and I like it needs low maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this kind of leather is harder than nappa. Looks cool and I like it needs low maintenance. Still debating if I go for broken in or size up.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Noni

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but order down a size!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! Super cute & comfortable. As previous reviews have stated, they do run a bit large. Unfortunately, I had not read the reviews before purchasing them, so I ordered my regular size. They are a bit large on me, but I think they will work fine with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: christina calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Lov me some docs, the look is awesome, not overly shiny but just enough to give a good look. So happy to have found these on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Fit Great
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly light weight and beautiful. Fit true to size. Much better fit than other canvas shoes, at least for women, than converse
customer_reviews.author: Huncamunca

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit perfectly.. I was looking for a good boot that would protect my feet during the ugly New York winter weather and I think these will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Always get compliments on these, they're comfortable and well made. I would recommend and will probably buy in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer-aware

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Feel great, look great. All round comfort. Very happy with purchase. No rubbing at heel, Everyone loves them. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Toulis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes so cute and comfortable and i sized down
customer_reviews.author: Cristina C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Love these shoes!!!! I get complements all of the time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaqulyn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cute shoe; im just closer to a 7 1/2 than a 7 so s bit small
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.. Costa

customer_reviews.title: super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable and are really cute! I hate that I can't wear them in the summer, due to how warm they are. Wish I could wear them all year round!!! I have already gotten tons of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: Melisan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots, they are very comfortable and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Keener

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes. I normally wear a size 10 even ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes. I normally wear a size 10 even though I'm really more like a size 10.5 (can't ever find 10.5) so these fit me well. So they are a bit larger than most shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased shoes in the UK just last year. Wondering if Doc Marten's are larger than regular shoes, love the shoes, but have to re order in UK size 6
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Todd

customer_reviews.title: Now having fun breaking them in...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gray ones and they looked better than expected. Heck, they fit better than expected. I went to the site to do the sizing quiz thingy (you get it when you click something in the product description box). I'm breaking them in now and it's not too bad; I'm just wearing them around the house though. Very happy with these pair and intend to update a month from now.
customer_reviews.author: AK HOUSTON

customer_reviews.title: Love these Doc Martens!
customer_reviews.text: These are glorious! The fit is great and they are comfortable. A little edgy and certainly cooler than you see on a daily basis when you are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: M. Importico

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Got these cuz my school requires black or white leather shoes and thought they’d be comfy. I wear them to school then work after and can’t say their the most comfortable shoes. I switched the soles for gel inserts and that made them bearable, but I expected them to be more comfortable. They fit as expected and looked just like the picture so they have that going for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoreditch is so stylish and amazing, although I bought from out of US
customer_reviews.text: Shoreditch is so stylish and amazing, although I bought from out of US, this pair of shoes is worth for me to do!
customer_reviews.author: waterwind

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely comfortable. They have great traction, are easy to clean, and most of all....look amazing on. Absolutely my favorite pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They are so so comfortable and cute. I get so many compliments on them any time I wear them. I did misread the first time I ordered and accidentally got a pair that were way too big (UK size) but with my Prime membership I had no trouble at all swapping them out for the right size.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cute
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these last winter, tried them on, and was a little deterred because they seemed pretty... well, I don't know, hipstery? I put them in the box and planned on returning them, but with a busy schedule the box stayed in my room and I never got around to it. This fall I needed something to walk through Sandy with and they were waiting. Yeah, they are a little edgy looking, but not too much. Wear them with whatever. They are really, really, comfortable, and are conducive to walking fast- good on days for 20 blocks of walking included in your commute.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my daughter as a birthday gift! She loves them! They are perfect! They look so cute on her.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Allbritton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good these are a good pair of doc martens
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Martens Shoreditch Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are similar to a Converse All-Star shoe. The soles are totally flat, and the insoles are flat as well. The outside canvas is far sturdier than a sneaker and the inside has a cozy lining. Nice casual boot, a bit like sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: great basic boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable, durable, and look awesome. I get lots of compliments on them. They're slim-fitting and not clunky at all. They're not warm or water resistant though, just a basic canvas boot. I would recommend getting them straight from the Dr. Martens website though -- a little cheaper and free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Elswick

customer_reviews.title: Purple Boots!
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful to have found Doc Marten boots in lightweight canvas, and in purple, too! They're a perfect fit, and feel very comfortable. The price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Logiatrix

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is super cute. You do have to size down significantly though. I'm normally a 6 1/2 in most shoes. I believe these don't run in half sizes. So I figured a 6 should fit perfectly. Ends up they are actually a little too roomy. I prefer my shoes to be a little more snug. I didn't exchange them because I was afraid a 5 would be too small. Other than that these are awesome and I have gotten many compliments. Pair it with some black leggings or some black skinny jeans and grungy t shirt, motorcycle jacket and a cute scarf! Watch out! Heads will turn, I promise you!
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Price, Fabulous Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 6 (UK size 4), but I ordered an entire size down (UK 3) and my shoes fit perfectly. I bought the gray, and the color is beautiful. It always picks up whatever color I'm wearing, whether it's purple, red, blue, etc. I would definitely recommend these shoes. So comfy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wackes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Victorian Flowers pattern and I am in love with them! They are really unique and super comfortable. I usually wear a size 8 and I kept reading to size down so I got them in a 7 and they fit perfectly! I would definitely size down.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these shoes. They seem to run just a tiny bit too big, but it's not at all bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley Hearney

customer_reviews.title: murky black canvas
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots but after wearing them once, the dye on the toe has rubbed off leaving the canvas looking a worn out white. So be careful not to sit on the carpet and rub the canvas or the pattern will disappear!
customer_reviews.author: Erana Ruki

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful boots in the world
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected, fit perfect, the price was right, they are super comfy, love the color.... I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Arcelia Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for all and my best regards Marita Sunder-Plaßmann
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the shoes. I am sorry to say they are too large. At that time I am not at home, so I can't send back the shoes to you. In one and a half week, I am back at home and I can send them back. I wanted size Uk 4/US 6 but I have got size Uk 7. Thanks for all and my best regards Marita Sunder-Plaßmann
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens Women's Shoreditch Boot
product_meta.description:
The eclectic collection is an experiment in modernization: we took original doc shapes, and mashed them up to create an evolved feel. like the shoreline: a slim, casual take on the 1460.

Dr. Martens is the stuff of legends. It all began near Munich, Germany in 1945 when Dr. Klaus Maertens injured his foot in a skiing accident in the Bavarian Alps. To make walking easier during the healing process, he designed a shoe with an air-cushioned sole. Using old rubber tires, he constructed soles that had air trapped within closed compartments. He showed his prototype to his engineer/inventor friend, Dr. Herbert Funck, and together they decided to develop and produce the shoes. Not only did the shoe solve the doctor's immediate problem, but it also started to sell well in Germany. By 1959 the two decided that they needed a company to produce and distribute the shoes, then called Dr. Maertens, in other parts of the world. At first, many manufacturers rejected the concept of an air cushioned sole as a short-lived gimmick. However, the R. Griggs Group, located in the village of Wollaston in England, decided to go along with the idea by creating the first work boot with the revolutionary sole. On the first of April 1960, the first cherry red eight-eyelet work boot was produced and named 1460. To sell the brand name better in England, the name was anglicized to Dr. Martens. The range was branded AirWair and the rest is history.
feature_bullets: Lace-up ankle boot featuring canvas upper for high-top sneaker appeal
